text: Cláudia Lima (born 5 September 1996) is a Portuguese footballer who plays as a midfielder and has appeared for the Portugal women's national team. ==Career== Lima has been capped for the Portugal national team, appearing for the team during the 2019 FIFA Women's World Cup qualifying cycle. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Portuguese women's footballers Category:Portugal women's international footballers Category:Women's association football midfielders
title: Cláudia Lima
